sentences.en: A method for designing compound achromatic wave plate made of mica and quartz is presented.
sentences.cn: 本文给出了一种利用云母、石英材料设计复合式消色差波片的方法.

sentences.en: Achromatic little a knot in one's heart grew on the hand, itch again painful, how cleared?
sentences.cn: 手上长了无色的小疙瘩, 又痒又痛, 怎样清除?

sentences.en: Achromatic: Without color. Black, white and gray are achromatic, but called colors by artist.
sentences.cn: 无色：没有色彩。黑色，白色和灰色是无色的，但美术家却称之为颜色。

sentences.en: CCR : Short for Complementary Colour Removal. A method of achromatic separations by Hell Company.
sentences.cn: 是英文字义“除去补色”的简称.是“海尔”公司所用的一种消色分色法.

sentences.en: Color Of or indicating a color, such as gray, black, or white , that lacks hue achromatic.
sentences.cn: 属于或表明一种缺乏色度的颜色的, 如灰 、 黑或白色的;无色彩的.

sentences.en: Its color is only blue and white two - day, one of blue achromatic effect of the best.
sentences.cn: 其颜色只有天蓝色和白色两种, 其中蓝色的消色效果为最佳.

sentences.en: Such water - soluble pen market prices relatively low achromatic speed more suitable for less demanding users.
sentences.cn: 这种水溶笔的市场价格较低,对消色速度要求不高的用户比较适合.

sentences.en: This research was on surface color discrimination of achromatic color in congenital red - green color - vision abnormal people.
sentences.cn: 该文就先天性红 - 绿色觉异常者对非彩色系表色色差的辨别展开了研究.

words.tran_cn: 消色差；[光] 消色差性
[光]消色差的；非染色质的；非彩色的
